bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

sense.def: Pathological Condition of a growth of flesh balls as redundancies in the mouth. Ben cao gang mu 本草綱目 Substance Entry she 麝 quotes Zhi qi ji fang 治奇疾方 : 口內肉球：有根如綫五寸余，如釵股，吐出乃能食物，捻之 則痛徹心者，麝香一錢研水服之，日三，自消 , “ Flesh balls in the mouth : They have thread-like roots of a length of 5 cun or longer, as if a hairpin had been inserted. When they are spit out, [the patient] can eat food again. If twisted with two fingers they cause a pain that goes right into the heart. Grind 1 qian of she xiang with water and ingest this three times a day, and they will dissolve by themselves”.
